A[c(5,8:10),4]=1
A[c(4,11:13),5]=1

A

```{r}
Katz.eigen = function(A,alphas){
  result = vector()
  for (a in alphas) {
    result = c(result,max(Mod(eigen(a*A)$values)))
  }
  return(result)
}

Katz.eigen(A, 0:10/10)  # [0,0.73] converge
```
```{r}
Katz.B = function(A, alpha) {
  return(alpha^(-1)*diag(1,14) - t(A))
}

d = t(A) %*% rep(1,14)

Katz.index = function(A, alphas) {
  result = vector()
  for (a in alphas) {
    B = Katz.B(A, a)
    result = c(result, jacobi(B,d, m=100))
  }
  return(result)
}

Katz.index(A, 1:10/10)
```
